attributes.action: stop miller beer being removed from UK shelves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that the beer (Miller beer-silver cans) I have been drinking for the last 15 years is being withdrawn from the U.K. shelves. This came as a complete shock to my system and has basically ruined my weekend. I need all the support I can get to prevent this from happening. I have a group of friends who like myself are trying to come to terms with this scandal.

Please Please sign this in protest of this outrageous action.

rejection.details: This would be a purely commercial decision for the manufacturer.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
